name: project-2
description: This is a Gluten Free Recipe App that will give a list of the most popular GF recipes. You, as the user, will be able to view and select all the different recipes, and are able to create your own recipe and add it to the site! You can include a picture, description, and the list of ingridients. If by chance you've changed your ingridients, no problem! You can edit them as well. No longer like the recipe you've created? You can delete it from the site as well.
